existing_features.title: Implement a hero section with large animated text displaying 'Nightmare', subtitle 'CSE Student | Programmer | AI Designer', animated introduction text, and two glowing call-to-action buttons labeled 'View Projects' and 'Download Resume'. Include a 3D rotating tech object or animated background element using React Three Fiber.

Create an About Me section with professional content describing Nightmare's passion for programming and design, interest in AI and modern web technologies, problem-solving mindset, and learning-focused attitude. Use glassmorphism card styling with smooth fade-in animation on scroll.

Build a Skills section with animated progress bars for five skills: C Programming, C++ Programming, Web Development, UI Design, and AI Tools. Each skill should have animated icons and glowing indicators that animate on scroll or page load.

Create a Certifications section displaying four certificate cards: 'Web Development with AI training including HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, DBMS, PHP, JavaScript, React and final project' (Intershala-WebDev-Certificate), 'Critical Thinking in the AI Era â€” HP LIFE course completion' (Critical Thinking in the AI Era), 'Additional web development certification (Cursa)' (Cursa-WebDev-Certificate), and 'Additional course certificate' (CAN_37971210_5058610). Each card should use glassmorphism styling with glowing borders and hover animations including preview effects.

Implement a Projects section with placeholder cards for three categories: Web frontend designs, AI-generated graphics, and Programming projects. Each card should include hover zoom animation and light reflection effect.

Build a Contact section with an email contact form and social media icons. Apply neon glow hover effects to both form elements and social icons. Use minimal futuristic layout with glassmorphism styling.

Implement a dark futuristic theme with glassmorphism and transparency effects throughout the entire website. Apply neon glow effects to buttons, 3D transformations to interactive elements, parallax scrolling, smooth page transitions, floating UI elements, gradient lighting, motion blur effects, and micro-interactions on hover and scroll events.
Create an interactive animated background using either particles system or animated grid pattern. The background should be performant, non-intrusive, and complement the dark futuristic theme.

Implement additional UI enhancements including cursor glow effect, page load animation, scroll-based element reveal animations, 3D tilt effect on cards, animated gradient borders, sticky navigation bar, and professional footer. Ensure all enhancements are performant and enhance user experience.

Ensure the entire portfolio website is fully responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Optimize for fast loading performance, implement SEO-friendly structure with proper meta tags and semantic HTML, ensure accessibility standards are met with ARIA labels and keyboard navigation, and implement smooth scrolling navigation between sections.

Render generated certificate placeholder images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated for the four certificates: Intershala-WebDev-Certificate, Critical Thinking in the AI Era, Cursa-WebDev-Certificate, and CAN_37971210_5058610.
